metadata.name: Olga
metadata.description:
There are **wisdom** and steadfastness in azure eyes. 
She conquered passions, **tamed** them 
and breathed new life into her lands.  
Worthy of the savior's mission. 
For she left the darkness 
and loved the **light**. 
 
Nothing is accidental. 
How this image turned out... I bought new fabrics for my workshop, and when I combined read and sky blue together, I saw the image of a dark-haired girl with blue eyes. 
A model named Olga was found for my idea. The details of the image were picked up during the shooting. So, there was a hoop on his head, as something close to the sacred. 
When I saw the final result, for some reason I recall Olga the Grand Duchess of Kiev. Who went through a dark path of cruel revenge for her beloved Igor, and then, decided to convert to Christianity as the **first** of the rulers of Kievan Rus. Now i saw that she was often depicted in a combination of red and blue colors. 
An interesting coincidence. But **maybe** it's not accidental?..

March 22, 2020
